abstract: Underscoring its goal of slimming down and shedding noncore assets, Bank of America said it would sell the majority of its stake in BlackRock.
snippet: Underscoring its goal of slimming down and shedding noncore assets, Bank of America said it would sell the majority of its stake in BlackRock.
lead_paragraph: Underscoring its goal of slimming down and shedding noncore assets, Bank of America disclosed Wednesday that it would sell the majority of its stake in BlackRock, the world’s biggest publicly traded money management firm.

headline.main: BofA to Sell Most of Its BlackRock Stake
